title: Bracelet
description: 2 carinated bands enclosing 2 double twisted flattened wires; set with elliptical turquoisoval turquoise in center, surrounded by 12 triangular turquoises, surrounded by 24 round turquoises, 3 oval at either side; twisted wire, spiral wire and stamped decoration cat.128, J#222 (center stone is pock-marked)
